§8§oAnthony Leverrier
Evgueni Karpov

§72010§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oThis paper has been withdrawn by the authors. The approach investigated in this preprint fails for the following reason: for a fixed n, the \u03f5-smooth min-entropy is a continuous function of \u03f5 for a given n-mode state but

the Lipschitz constant of the function increases with n. As a consequence, one cannot interchange thelimits \u03f5 tending to 0 withn tending to infinity. Note, however, that an unconditional security proof of continuous-variable quantum
key distribution was established in Phys. Rev. Lett. 102, 110504 (2009) (preprint arXiv:0809.2243)\u00a7r
